about_the_game:
Spells Dungeon offers a classic roguelike experience with the iconic monsters that every dungeon crawler should have. Each dungeon level offers a unique theme, unique enemies, and a challenging boss fight at the end. Defeat the boss to advance to the next level..
—if you have what it takes. .

Gameplay:
You are a wizard, starting with just a fireball-casting staff. Embark on a journey solo or with up to 4 friends in a cooperative adventure, uncover a deep immersive story with multiple endings that will challenge everything you know.

BUILT FOR REPLAYABILITY:

  • Explore randomly generated dungeons with unique items in each run.
  • Lose everything upon death, making each playthrough a fresh challenge.
  • No classes, build crazy combos without limitations.

Developer's Note:
This game is actively updated by a solo game developer. With each update, expect new items, monsters, and secret easter eggs. I am dedicated to creating games that are not only fun but also worth your time.

When a world ends, a new one is born. In this new realm some souls refuse to fade, clinging to the remnants of their previous world's memories and power as reality gradually takes shape.
